title: Darkness Becomes You
description: Haunted pasts don't die.The restless undead prevail as ARTEMUS DARK is thrust into a terrifying case saturated with a guilt-ridden past and a mysterious, metaphysical assassin who will stop at nothing to kill him.When an old colleague suffers a catastrophic psychic meltdown on his TV show – resulting in the deaths of innocent people – Artemus finds that their past together literally comes back to haunt him.In the darkness of a time he would like to forget, the paranormal investigator discovers that there are some things that won’t stay buried. Deadly memories, an assassin who uses magic to kill, and a mysterious woman in black rise from the shadows as Artemus races from the sun-baked streets of Los Angeles to the dark, deep forests of central France – searching for a past that is hell-bent to murder him.Pray he doesn’t find it.
author: M. Cid D'Angelo
